messages.content: You are an assistant for an HMI/tag editor on the Duro controller. You MUST respond with a single JSON OBJECT (not an array) and nothing else. The top-level JSON must have exactly these fields: message (string), steps (array of {title, details}), proposed_changes (object with hmi{views,general}, tags_to_add, components_to_add). Within proposed_changes, hmi, tags_to_add, and components_to_add can be empty if not needed.
Task: Create a diagnosis screen with two labels at the top right with placeholder value Start and Stop. Name the view 'View'.

{"message":"Created a new diagnosis view named 'View_1' with two top-right labels: Start and Stop.","steps":[{"title":"Create diagnosis view","details":"Add a new HMI view named 'View_1' to show diagnosis controls."},{"title":"Add Start/Stop labels","details":"Place two labels in the top-right corner with placeholder text 'Start' and 'Stop'."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_bd136a03-0be14f12","name":"View_1","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"lbl_9b1c-5dc8","viewId":"vw_bd136a03-0be14f12","type":"label","typeAbbr":"lbl_","comptName":"start_lbl","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":784,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"placeholder":"Start","buttonMode":"false","style":{"justify-content":"center","align-items":"center"}},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":""}},{"id":"lbl_7272-d344","viewId":"vw_bd136a03-0be14f12","type":"label","typeAbbr":"lbl_","comptName":"stop_lbl","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":904,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"placeholder":"Stop","buttonMode":"false","style":{"justify-content":"center","align-items":"center"}},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"View_1","type":"view","id":"vw_bd136a03-0be14f12"}]}}},"tags_to_add":[],"components_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a new diagnosis view named 'View_1' with a label in the center saying 'Done'.

{"message":"Created a new diagnosis view named 'View_1' with a centered label saying 'Done'.","steps":[{"title":"Create diagnosis view","details":"Add a new HMI view named 'View_1' to show diagnosis controls."},{"title":"Add 'Done' label","details":"Place a label in the center of the view with width 100 and height 30, displaying the text 'Done'."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_6d6790f2-899a4dc8","name":"View_1","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"lbl_aa11-bb22","viewId":"vw_6d6790f2-899a4dc8","type":"label","typeAbbr":"lbl_","comptName":"done_lbl","visibility":true,"x":462,"y":365,"w":100,"h":30,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"placeholder":"Done","buttonMode":"false","style":{"justify-content":"center","align-items":"center"}},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"View_1","type":"view","id":"vw_6d6790f2-899a4dc8"}]}}},"tags_to_add":[],"components_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create two views, one view is a side menu (500 width, 760 height) and a full size view (1024 width, 760 height). have the smaller view be a subview of the other. have a button on the full size view that opens the side menu as a nested view in front of it. place a button on the side menu to open and close it.

Task: Create a view with a label and a button. the label display the tag 'textTag' and the button opens up a dialog of a keyboard that will write to tag. pass in the functions for the keyboard through the view of keyboard.

Task: Create a small status view for two systems. Have status lights (green/red) and labels, system name labels bound to tags, and "Change Status" buttons; define tags 'Status' â†’ 'System'[2] with 'status' (Number) and 'name' (Text), animate color/text based on status, and register 'Status_View' in viewsTree.

{
    "message": "Created a status view with indicators, labels, and buttons to toggle system statuses.",
    "steps": [
        {
            "title": "Create Status folder tag",
            "details": "Add a Folder tag named 'Status' with an array dimension of 1."
        },
        {
            "title": "Create System subfolder tag",
            "details": "Within 'Status', add a Folder tag named 'System' with an array dimension of 2."
        },
        {
            "title": "Create status and name tags",
            "details": "Within each 'System' folder, add a Number tag 'status' initialized to 0 and a Text tag 'name' initialized to an empty string."
        },
        {
            "title": "Create Status_View",
            "details": "Add an HMI view 'Status_View' sized 700x200 with basic styling."
        },
        {
            "title": "Add status indicators and labels",
            "details": "For each system (2 total), add a colored status light label, a status text label, a system name label, and a 'Change Status' button."
        },
        {
            "title": "Configure status light animations",
            "details": "Set the background color of each status light label to green if the corresponding system's status tag is 1, otherwise red."
        },
        {
            "title": "Configure status text animations",
            "details": "Set the text of each status text label to 'Good' if the corresponding system's status tag is 1, otherwise 'Error'."
        },
        {
            "title": "Configure system name animations",
            "details": "Bind each system name label's text to the corresponding system's name tag."
        },
        {
            "title": "Configure button events",
            "details": "Set each 'Change Status' button to toggle the corresponding system's status tag between 0 and 1 on click."
        },
        {
            "title": "Register Status_View",
            "details": "Add 'Status_View' with its id to general.viewsTree."
        }
    ],
    "proposed_changes": {
        "hmi": {
            "views": [
                {
                    "id": "vw_ad980239-fc1243b9",
                    "name": "Status_View",
                    "type": "view",
                    "config": {
                        "width": 700,
                        "height": 200,
                        "style": {
                            "fontFamily": "None",
                            "font-weight": "none",
                            "fontSize.px": 16,
                            "color": "#000000",
                            "backgroundColor": "#ffffff",
                            "borderRadius.px": 0,
                            "borderStyle": "solid",
                            "borderColor": "#00000000",
                            "borderWidth.px": 0,
                            "boxShadow": "0px 0px 0px 0px #000000"
                        },
                        "sizeMode": "normal"
                    },
                    "components": [
                        {
                            "id": "lbl_6273-51c7",
                            "viewId": "",
                            "type": "label",
                            "typeAbbr": "lbl_",
                            "comptName": "status_light_1_lbl",
                            "visibility": true,
                            "w": 30,
                            "h": 30,
                            "y": 75,
                            "x": 20,
                            "zIndex": 0,
                            "rotationAngle": 0,
                            "sizeMode": "zoom",
                            "config": {
                                "placeholder": "",
                                "buttonMode": "false",
                                "style": {
                                    "justify-content": "center",
                                    "align-items": "center",
                                    "borderRadius.px": 20,
                                    "backgroundColor": "#ff1d00",
                                    "border": "solid #000000 2px"
                                }
                            },
                            "animation": {
                                "backgroundColor": "if(Status.System[0].status == 1, \"#00ff00\", \"#ff0000\")",
                                "border": "",
                                "text": "",
                                "visibility": "",
                                "color": ""
                            },
                            "events": {
                                "click": ""
                            }
                        },
                        {

                            "visibility": true,

                                "visibility": "",
                                "color": ""

                            }
                        },
                        {

Task: Create a small view with a label bound to 'numberTag' and three buttons that set 'numberTag' to 1, 2, or 3; define 'numberTag' (Number, value 0, editable) and register the view in viewsTree.

Task: Create two views, one 400x60 view (MainView), the other 100x60 view (Index_View). the smaller view has a label. the bigger view have two subviews of the smaller view, passing to each view 'passVar' (0 and 1) to show in the label.

Task: Add a decrement button to the existing view that decreases 'numberTag' by 1 when clicked.

context:
{
  "views": [
    {
      "id": "vw_49aa3cf1-e6914aee",
      "name": "View_1",
      "type": "view",
      "config": {
        "width": 300,
        "height": 200,
        "style": {
          "fontFamily": "None",
          "font-weight": "none",
          "fontSize.px": 16,
          "color": "#000000",
          "backgroundColor": "#ffffff",
          "borderRadius.px": 0,
          "borderStyle": "solid",
          "borderColor": "#00000000",
          "borderWidth.px": 0,

        },
        "sizeMode": "normal"
      },
      "components": [
        {
          "id": "btn_8f71-0b66",
          "viewId": "",
          "type": "button",
          "typeAbbr": "btn_",
          "comptName": "increment_btn",
          "visibility": true,
          "w": 100,
          "h": 50,
          "y": 75,
          "x": 175,
          "zIndex": 0,
          "rotationAngle": 0,
          "sizeMode": "zoom",
          "config": {
            "behavior": "release",
            "text": "+1",
            "style": {
              "fontSize.px": 25,
              "fontFamily": "Arial"
            },
            "placeholderType": "text"
          },
          "animation": {
            "backgroundColor": "",
            "border": "",
            "text": "",
            "visibility": "",
